accountSettings.title: Account
accountSettings.changedDescription: Your account information has been changed.

notificationPanel.title: Notifications
notificationPanel.noNotification: We'll notify you about important updates and any time you're mentioned on Baserow.

clearAllNotificationsConfirmModal.title: Are you sure you want to clear all notifications?
clearAllNotificationsConfirmModal.message: All the notifications will be permanently deleted and you won't be able to see them again.

passwordSettings.title: Change password
passwordSettings.changedDescription: Your password has been changed. The next time you want to login, you have to use your new password.
passwordSettings.repeatNewPasswordMatchError: This field must match your new password field.
passwordSettings.errorInvalidOldPasswordMessage: Could not change your password because your old password is invalid.

deleteAccountSettings.title: Delete account
deleteAccountSettings.description: You can schedule the deletion of your account by entering your current password and clicking the button. Your account will be permanently deleted after {days} days. In the meantime, if you log in again, your account deletion will be cancelled.
deleteAccountSettings.workspaceNoticeDescription: When your account is permanently deleted, all workspaces and associated data for which you are the last active user with Admin permissions will also be deleted. The workspaces shown below are the ones that will be deleted because you are the only admin. To prevent them being deleted you must first give another user admin before deleting your account.
deleteAccountSettings.orphanWorkspaces: Will also be permanently deleted after the grace time
deleteAccountSettings.orphanWorkspaceMemberCount: shared with nobody|shared with one user|shared with {count} users
deleteAccountSettings.repeatPasswordMatchError: This field must match the first password field.
deleteAccountSettings.errorInvalidPasswordMessage: Could not delete your account because your password is invalid.
deleteAccountSettings.errorUserIsLastAdminMessage: Could not delete your account because your are the last administrator of this Baserow instance.
deleteAccountSettings.accountDeletedSuccessMessage: Your account has been scheduled to be deleted.
deleteAccountSettings.workspaceLoadingErrorDescription: Checking the workspaces to be deleted failed, please refresh the page.

error.alreadyExistsMessage: A user with the provided e-mail address already exists.
error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
error.disabledAccountMessage: This user account has been disabled.
error.incorrectCredentialMessage: The provided e-mail address or password is incorrect.

leaveWorkspaceModal.title: Leave {workspace}
leaveWorkspaceModal.message: Are you sure you want to leave the workspace {workspace}? You won't be able to access the related applications anymore and if you want to regain access, one of the admins must invite you again. If you leave the workspace, it will not be deleted. All the other members will still have access to it. It is not possible to leave a workspace if you're the last admin because that will leave it unmaintained.

exportWorkspaceModal.title: Export
exportWorkspaceModal.description: Your data will be exported as a ZIP file, which can be imported into other Baserow instance.
exportWorkspaceModal.noExports: No exports for this workspace yet.

exportWorkspaceForm.onlyStructureDescription: If enabled, only the structure of the applications will be exported. The data will not be included.

importWorkspaceModal.title: Import Baserow data
importWorkspaceModal.description: You can import an existing Baserow data by uploading the .zip file from other Baserow instance.
importWorkspaceModal.signatureVerificationNote: It's not possible to import a zip file from an untrusted source.
importWorkspaceModal.invalidResourceMessage: The provided file is not a valid Baserow export.
importWorkspaceModal.untrustedPublicKeyMessage: The provided file is signed with an untrusted public key. Ask your administrator to add the public key to the list of trusted keys or disable the signature verification to be able to import this file.

dashboardVerifyEmail.title: Please check your mailbox and click on the link to verify your email.

resendEmailVerification.confirmationEmailSentDescription: The confirmation email has been sent.

verifyEmailAddress.confirmation: Your email address has been verified.
verifyEmailAddress.disabledPasswordProvider: The password authentication provider has been disabled.
verifyEmailAddress.emailMismatchWarning: Please note that the verified email doesn't belong to the account that you are currently using.

emailNotVerified.title: Email verification required
emailNotVerified.description: Please check your mailbox and click on the link to verify. Once verified, your account will be activated.

workspaceInviteForm.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

generativeAIModelType.openaiApiKeyDescription: Provide an OpenAI API key if you would like to enable the integration. [Instructions on getting an API key](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key).
generativeAIModelType.openaiModelsDescription: Provide a list of comma separated [OpenAI models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/continuous-model-upgrades) that can be used in Baserow. (e.g. `gpt-3.5-turbo,gpt-4`)
generativeAIModelType.anthropicApiKeyDescription: Provide an Anthropic API key if you would like to enable the integration. [Instructions on getting an API key](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api/getting-started).
generativeAIModelType.anthropicModelsDescription: Provide a list of comma separated [Anthropic models](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/about-claude/models) that can be used in Baserow. (e.g. `claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022,claude-3-opus-20240229`)
generativeAIModelType.mistralApiKeyDescription: Provide a Mistral API key if you would like to enable the integration. [Instructions on getting an API key](https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/quickstart/).
generativeAIModelType.mistralModelsDescription: Provide a list of comma separated [Mistral models](https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/models/models_overview/) that can be used in Baserow. (e.g. `mistral-large-latest,mistral-small-latest`)
generativeAIModelType.ollamaHostDescription: Provide the hostname to your [Ollama](https://ollama.com/) server. This typically runs locally on your own device.
generativeAIModelType.ollamaModelsDescription: Provide a list of comma separated [Ollama installed models](https://ollama.com/library). Note that the model must be downloaded and installed before it can be used. (e.g. `llama2,mistral`)
generativeAIModelType.openRouterApiKeyDescription: Provide an OpenRouter API key if you would like to enable the integration. [get an API key](https://openrouter.ai/settings/keys).
generativeAIModelType.openRouterModelsDescription: Provide a list of comma separated [OpenRouter models](https://openrouter.ai/models) that can be used in Baserow. (e.g. `openai/gpt-4o,anthropic/claude-3-haiku`)

generativeAIWorkspaceSettings.title: Generative AI settings
generativeAIWorkspaceSettings.description: These settings can be used to optionally set generative AI configuration on workspace level. Features like the AI field can be disabled because they lack an API key for one of the supported models. By providing the settings here, you can enable those features. Leaving a value blank defaults back to the global instance settings. Note that everyone in the workspace will share these settings.
generativeAIWorkspaceSettings.changedDescription: The settings have been updated and they will be now used in this workspace.

createWorkspaceModal.permissionDeniedBody: You do not have the required permission to create a new workspace.

trashContents.message: Restore deleted items from the past {duration}
trashContents.empty: Nothing has been deleted in the past three days.

trashEmptyModal.titleIsTrashed: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {name}?
trashEmptyModal.titleIsNotTrashed: Are you sure you want to empty the trash of {name}?
trashEmptyModal.messageIsTrashed: This will permanently delete it and all of its contents. After which they cannot be recovered.
trashEmptyModal.messageIsNotTrashed: This will permanently delete the listed items. After which they cannot be recovered.

trashModal.emptyMessage: You aren't a member of any workspace. Applications like databases belong to a workspace, so in order to create them you need to create a workspace.
trashModal.emptyMessageWithoutCreatePermission: You aren't a member of any workspace. Applications like databases belong to a workspace, so in order to create them you will need to be invited to a workspace by an administrator first.

uploadFileUserFileUpload.clickOrDrop: Click or drop your files here

uploadFileDropzone.clickOrDrop: Click or drop your files here
uploadFileDropzone.errorTooManyFilesMessage: You can only upload a single file
uploadFileDropzone.errorWrongFileTypeMessage: You can't upload a file of type {type}

createApplicationContext.importWorkspaceDesc: Add existing data from a Baserow instance.

failedConnectingToast.content: Connection to the server has failed. Please refresh the page.

userSessionExpiredToast.title: Session expired
userSessionExpiredToast.content: You were logged out because your authentication token has expired. Please login again.

userPasswordChangedToast.title: Password changed
userPasswordChangedToast.content: Your password has been changed. Please login again.

undoRedoToast.skippingUndoDueToError: Undo failed due to unknown error, skipping it.
undoRedoToast.skippingRedoDueToError: Redo failed due to unknown error, skipping it.

permissionsUpdatedToast.title: Permissions updated
permissionsUpdatedToast.content: This might affect what you have access to, please reload the page.

errorLayout.notFound: The page you are looking for has not been found. This might be because URL is incorrect or that you donâ€™t have permission to view this page.
errorLayout.error: Something went wrong while loading the page. Our developers have been notified of the issue. Please try to refresh or return to the dashboard.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.alertText: By sharing Baserow you are helping us to improve the product and to make it more useful for you.
dashboard.tweetContent: Check out @baserow an open source no-code database tool and Airtable alternative!
dashboard.knowledgeBaseMessage: Find answers to all of your questions
dashboard.emptyWorkspaceMessage: Get started by creating a new database or application.
dashboard.noWorkspaceDescription: Get started by creating a new workspace

login.title: Welcome back
login.displayPasswordLogin: Log in using email and password

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.message: You can now login to Baserow using your new password.
resetPassword.errorInvalidLinkMessage: Could not reset the password because the link is invalid.
resetPassword.errorLinkExpiredMessage: The password reset link has expired. Please request another one.
resetPassword.disabledMessage: It's not possible to reset the password because it has been disabled.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.disabledMessage: It's not possible to create an account because it has been disabled.
signup.requireFirstUserMessage: Please fill the form below to create the admin user.
signup.agreeTerms: By creating an account, you agree to the {0} {1} {2}

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.message: Enter your email address and weâ€™ll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.confirmation: We sent an email to {email}, which contains a link to reset your Baserow password.
forgotPassword.disabledMessage: It's not possible to reset the password because it has been disabled.

settings.instanceIdDescription: The instance ID is the unique identifier of your Baserow copy.
settings.baserowVersionDescription: The version number of this instance.
settings.settingAllowResetPasswordDescription: By default, users can request a password reset link.
settings.settingAllowResetPasswordWarning: Please note that you could lock yourself out of the system and that access can't be restored if you forget your password.
settings.settingAllowNewAccountsDescription: By default, any user visiting your Baserow domain can sign up for a new account.
settings.settingAllowSignupsViaWorkspaceInvitatio: Even if the creation of new accounts is disabled, this option permits directly invited users to still create an account.
settings.settingAllowNonStaffCreateWorkspaceOpera: Allow everyone to create new workspaces
By default, everyone can create new workspaces. Disable this to only allow staff to create new workspaces.
New users will have a workspace automatically created for them where they are an Admin.
settings.settingTrackWorkspaceUsageDescription: Enables a nightly job that counts row and file usage per workspace, displayed on the premium workspace admin page.
settings.settingUserDeletionGraceDelayDescription: This is the number of days without a login after which an account scheduled for deletion is permanently deleted.
settings.invalidAccountDeletionGraceDelay: This value is required and must be a positive integer smaller than 32000
settings.emailVerificationDescription: Controls whether email addresses have to be verified.
settings.settingsVerifyImportSignatureDescription: When enabled, the signature of the imported data is verified to ensure the data has not been tampered with.

formSidebar.fieldsDescription: All the fields are in the form.

modal.title: Prefill or hide fields dynamically
modal.descriptionPartOne: Forms can be prefilled in order to help the user fill in the form faster.
modal.descriptionPartTwo: All fields which are available in the form can be prefilled.

howToHide.title: How to hide a field
howToHide.description: If you want to hide a field dynamically, you can do so via query parameters added to the public from url. These query parameters are prefixed with `hide_` to avoid collision with potential future query parameters.

howToPrefill.title: How to prefill a form
howToPrefill.description: If you want to prefill a form with data you can do so via query parameters added to the public form url. These query parameters are prefixed with `prefill` to avoid any collision with potential future query parameters.

format.title: Format
format.description: The format of the query parameters is as follows:

example.title: Example
example.description: In the example below we want to prefill a field called `Name` with the value of `Mike`

spaces.title: Spaces
spaces.description: Spaces in the field name are replaced with `+` to avoid any issues with the query parameter.

multipleValues.title: Multiple values
multipleValues.description: If you want to prefill multiple fields you can do so by adding a `,` between the values.

specialFieldTypes.title: Special field types
specialFieldTypes.description: Generally the prefill value is the same as the value of the field. But there are some exceptions where the value is translated to a different value.

ratingField.title: Rating field
ratingField.description: A rating field accepts a number to indicate how many stars should be filled.

linkRowField.title: Link row field
linkRowField.description: A link row field can accept the value that is shown in the select dropdown.

selectField.title: Single Select / Multiple Select field
selectField.description: A single select field can accept the value that is shown in the select dropdown. So does the Multiple Select field, but it can also accept multiple values.

dateField.title: Date field
dateField.description: A date field can accept a date in the following formats and will use the date format of the field to parse the date.
dateField.codeSnippet:
// Standards
ISO_8601

// General formats
'YYYY-MM-DD',
'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm A',
'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm',

// EU
'DD/MM/YYYY', 
'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm A', 
'DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm'

// US
'MM/DD/YYYY', 
'MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm A', 
'MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm'

job.errorJobCannotBeCancelledDescription:
Itâ€™s not possible to cancel the job as it has already been completed.
Please delete the first snapshot in the list below to remove it.
job.errorJobAlreadyRunningDescription: Another import job is already running. You need to wait for that one to finish before starting another.

datetime.secondsAgo: Just now | 1 second ago | {n} seconds ago
datetime.minutesAgo: 0 minutes ago | 1 minute ago | {n} minutes ago
datetime.hoursAgo: 0 hours ago | 1 hour ago | {n} hours ago
datetime.daysAgo: 0 days ago | 1 day ago | {n} days ago
datetime.monthsAgo: 0 months ago | 1 month ago | {n} months ago
datetime.yearsAgo: 0 years ago | 1 year ago | {n} years ago

columns.highestRoleHelpText: The highest role this user assigned to them directly or from a team, on anything in this workspace

userAlreadyInWorkspace.title: User is already in the workspace.
userAlreadyInWorkspace.text: It is not possible to send an invitation when the user is already a member of the workspace.

removeFromWorkspaceModal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from {workspaceName}? This action cannot be undone.

workspaceInvitationRejectedNotification.title: {sender} has rejected your invitation to join {workspaceName}

versionUpgradeNotification.title: {version} is here! Check out what's new.

emailNotifications.title: Email notifications
emailNotifications.label: Mentions, comments and other notifications
emailNotifications.description: Configure the frequency in which emails are sent to your inbox.

dataExplorer.noProvidersText: No data providers were found. To get started you can, for example, add a data source or page parameter.

selectAIModelForm.temperatureDescription: The temperature of an LLM, a parameter set between 0 and {max}, adjusts response randomnessâ€”lower values yield focused answers, while higher values increase creativity.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.cancel: I don't want help setting up
onboarding.failedDescription: The onboarding did not fully complete, although some parts might have been completed.

inviteStep.title: Invite collaborators
inviteStep.description: You can always add more later.

moreStep.people: How many people are in your team?
moreStep.share: I'm okay with sharing this with the Baserow team

teamStep.title: Let's build your first workspace together!

workspacesAdminTable.name: Name
workspacesAdminTable.usageHelpText: Calculated nightly when the track workspace usage setting is enabled

deleteWorkspaceModal.title: Delete {name}
deleteWorkspaceModal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the workspace: {name}?
deleteWorkspaceModal.comment: The workspace will be permanently deleted, including the related applications. It is not possible to undo this action.

error.doesntMatch: This field must match your password field.

warning.changeEmail: Changing this users email address means when they sign in they must use the new email address to do so. This must be communicated with that user.
warning.inactiveUser: When a user is marked as inactive they are prevented from signing in.
warning.userStaff: Making the user staff gives them admin access to all users, all workspaces and the ability to revoke your own staff permissions.

error.invalidName: Please enter a valid full name, it must be longer than 2 letters and less than 150.
error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

deleteUserModal.title: Delete {username}
deleteUserModal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the user: {name}?
deleteUserModal.comment1: The user account will be deleted, however the workspaces that user is a member of will continue existing. The users workspace will not be deleted, even if this user is the last user in the workspace. Deleting the last user in a workspace prevents anyone being able to access that workspace.
deleteUserModal.comment2: After deleting a user it is possible for a new user to sign up again using the deleted users email address. To ensure they cannot sign up again instead deactivate the user and do not delete them.

formGroup.protectedField: This field is protected. Click to change.
